message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, with the understanding that the money will be worth less in later rounds.
You started with a 60/40 split, I'll offer a 55/45 split in my favor, but I'll give you a slightly better deal to start.
Let's compromise. I propose a 50/50 split, as the inflation will impact us both if we keep going. It's a fair deal.
You're right that inflation affects us both, but I think I can do better than 50/50. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a good deal for you.
I understand your position, Bob. Let's meet in the middle. I propose a 45/55 split in your favor, to avoid further inflation and reach a conclusion.
